4316830.name: Evergain Adventure
4316830.description:
Evergain Adventure is a fast paced 2D roguelite focused on skill based combat, distinct weapon playstyles, and replayable runs.

Fight through procedurally generated zones, adapt to escalating difficulty, and master different combat styles as each run pushes you to go further.

Price

The game will cost between $3.00 - $5.00. The final price is still undecided.

Key Features

  • Three distinct weapon styles
    Choose between swords, bows, and daggers, each offering a unique way to play: tanky melee control, precise ranged combat, or fast high risk aggression.

  • Procedurally generated runs
    Rooms, encounters, and rewards change every run, keeping gameplay fresh and unpredictable.

  • Multiple biomes
    Battle through visually distinct zones, from corrupted forests to bioluminescent mushroom regions and winter lands.

  • Simple, impactful upgrades
    Collect power-ups that enhance damage, speed, survivability, and weapon identity without overwhelming complexity.

  • Skill driven combat
    Success depends on positioning, timing, and decision making.
